**6–10 Business Days & Flat Rate Pricing**

**Priority Mail International** service is a reliable and economical way to ship to more than 180 countries, including Canada, Mexico, and Australia.
- Flat Rate option: Ship using free **Flat Rate Boxes and Envelopes** (envelopes and small boxes up to 4 lbs, medium and large boxes up to 20 lbs), starting at $30.90.
